DOC.detailed_description: We perform prospective randomize control trial involve woman singleton gestation â‰¥ 34 week gestation require induction labor diagnosis PROM unfavorable cervix . PROM diagnose confirm sterile speculum examination demonstrate pool and/or positive ferning nitrazine . Determination patient eligibility base clinical exam confirmation PROM . Upon diagnosis , patient meet inclusion criterion accepts participate study , consent study investigator randomize prostaglandin follow oxytocin oxytocin alone group . Allocation concealment perform via utilization pre-sequentially numbered , manila seal envelope staple close . There two treatment group analyze intent-to-treat basis . Randomization perform use computer generate simple randomization sequence . Data safety monitoring instituted ( see data safety monitoring plan ) . Once randomization complete , labor delivery provider inform treatment arm place chart . Those randomized prostaglandin arm receive PGE1 ( misoprostol ) dose 25mcg place vaginally every 4 hour per hospital protocol . Those randomized oxytocin arm receive infusion oxytocin , titrate per hospital protocol adequate contraction . Further management start respective arm base clinical judgment provider .
